entry.title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a â­ï¸

entry.title: Religion inc. God Simulator
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • All at onceï¼š$1.99 â†’ $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $1.99]

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$0.29

In-App Purchases

  • All at onceï¼š$0.99
  • Game modesï¼š$0.99
  • Chests in the seaï¼š$0.99
  • Destructiveï¼š$0.49
  • Shamanismï¼š$0.49
  • Totalitarianï¼š$0.49
  • Pantheonï¼š$0.49

Application Description

You are reading this text. But why? Are you looking for a game, or has the game found you? Religion Inc. is more than just a strategy game. It is a simulation of creating a new reality. Will you shape faith, or will faith shape you? Humanity has always sought light in the darkness. It has always longed to believe in something greater, something that gives meaning to existence. Thatâ€™s how religions were born â€“ as beacons in the storms of history, as compasses in the ocean of life. What if you become the creator of a religion? What if you could build your own faith, your own truth, your own reality? You are the Creator. You are the source. You are the inspiration. And if you are reading this text â€“ youâ€™re already in the game! All thatâ€™s left is to install â€“ and enjoy the process, the simulation of creating religions! Become the source of faith â€“ in the strategy simulator Religion Inc. Humanity has always felt the need to believe in something greater than itself. Throughout history, people have searched for a light that could guide them through the darkness of the ages. For millions, that light became faith. Religion became a beacon, helping many find meaning in this world, weather the storms of change, and discover a path to happiness. There are many religions in the world, each shaped by its time and its challenges. But how else could this process have developed? What other fascinating and diverse forms could human beliefs have taken? The answers await you in our new game! Create your own unique religion, test its strength through the trials of time, and see if it can lead humanity to unity. Game Features *A variety of religious archetypes with unique cultural values and traditions! *Unlock all archetypes through gameplay: monotheism, spiritualism, pantheon, shamanism, paganism, and many more! *Will your followers become devoted fanatics or achieve higher enlightenment? The choice is yours! *Hundreds of real-world religious aspects â€“ and even more to come! Learn more about world religions! *Unique active abilities for each archetype â€“ perform miracles and change the world! *Relaxing gameplay, perfect for an evening break: collect faith points with simple clicks and explore various religious aspects. Play at your own pace and enjoy! Create your own unique religion by combining different religious aspects in the strategic simulator â€“ Religion Inc. Peace and love to all, brothers and sisters!

entry.title: Cultist Simulator
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$6.99 â†’ $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $6.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$1.99

In-App Purchases

  • Forbidden Bundleï¼š$6.99
  • The Dancerï¼š$1.99
  • The Ghoulï¼š$1.99
  • The Priestï¼š$1.99
  • The Exileï¼š$4.99

Application Description

SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES. BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck! In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age. Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now weâ€™re bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile. â€¢ Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history. Cultist Simulator doesnâ€™t hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time youâ€™ll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees. â€¢ Intense, immersive narrative â€“ Combine cards to tell your own story. A hefty novelâ€™s worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end. â€¢ A rich Lovecraftian world â€“ Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies. Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraftâ€™s tales to an entirely new setting. Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics... â€¢ The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal â€¢ The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened â€¢ The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit â€¢ The Exile - Some there are who will not yield If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on â€œContact usâ€ at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Codenames
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$4.99 â†’ $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $4.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$0.99

Application Description

Step into the thrilling world of spies and secret agents! Codenames App brings the beloved word association game to your mobile device in a dynamic and engaging new way. Decipher your spymaster's one-word clues, connect the right words, and contact all your agents before the opposing team does to claim victory. This digital adaptation captures all the excitement of one of the most popular board games worldwide, now optimized for your pocket. A Game of Clever Connections and Quick Thinking --------------------------------------------------- Codenames App is an asynchronous multiplayer experience where two rival teams face off in a battle of wits and wordplay. Your objective? Find the best way to link as many words as possible with a single clue, outsmart the opposing team, and lead your side to victory. Whether you're teaming up with friends, playing against other secret agents, or going solo, the Codenames App offers endless strategic fun for everyone. Inspired by the Iconic Board Game ---------------------------------- Join the millions of players worldwide who have fallen in love with Codenames. Designed by Vlaada ChvÃ¡til, the Codenames App is the latest addition to the renowned Codenames family. Experience the game that has captivated people of all ages and become a cultural phenomenon. More Content, More Fun ------------------------- While staying true to the originalâ€™s clever word-based puzzle mechanics, the Codenames App goes beyond the table, bringing you thousands of new thematic words and engaging twists on gameplay. Enjoy new modes, unlock exciting upgrades, and collect achievements as you explore deeper into the world of Codenames. Play Anytime, Anywhere ------------------------ With our asynchronous multiplayer system, you can play at your own pace without the need to wait for others to be online at the same time. Each player has up to 24 hours to take their turn, so the game fits perfectly into your schedule. Start multiple matches, challenge new players, or enjoy special daily solo challenges. Build Your Secret Agent Career ------------------------------- Rise through the ranks of your spy agency, leveling up and earning rewards along the way. Prove your mastery in word association puzzles, unlock unique gadgets, new game modes, and expand your personal word collection. Showcase your skills and become the ultimate spymaster! Connect and Compete with Friends ----------------------------------- Challenge your friends or find new opponents from around the globe through our matchmaking system. Share your achievements, unlocked modes, and special word collections in friendly matches. Whether you're playing casually or climbing the competitive ranks, Codenames App is all about having fun with words. Codenames App - The Board Game You Love, Reimagined for Your Mobile!

entry.title: Astrea: Six-Sided Oracles
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$9.99 â†’ $8.99 [$8.99 ~ $9.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$8.99

Application Description

Astrea is a DICE-deck-building roguelike that flips the script on deckbuilders by using dice instead of cards and an unique dual â€œdamageâ€ system: Purification vs Corruption. Features â€¢ Unique dual â€œdamageâ€ system: Purification vs Corruption - In Astrea there is a new type of â€œdamageâ€ system. Purification can be used to damage enemies or heal yourself. On the other hand, corruption can be used to damage yourself or heal the enemies. Pacify enemies through Purification, or Corrupt yourself to unleash abilities that help tip the scales. â€¢ Dynamic Health Bar system - With skills attached to your health bar, you can take Corruption to enable these skills and unleash powerful abilities. But be careful, if you take too much Corruption you will be consumed by it. â€¢ Not cards, but dice! - Build a dice pool that fits your playstyle. Choose from over 350 dice and three dice types; reliably safe, perfectly balanced, or powerfully risky. A dice type system designed with high-risk, high-reward in its core. â€¢ Customize your dice - Forge your fate by editing die faces with new actions, tipping the odds of powerful results into your favor. â€¢ Choose from Six Brave Oracles - Each possessing their own unique dice sets, abilities, and playstyles. From ingenious spellcasters to brutish berserkers, whether you like beating the opponent into submission or outsmarting them with clever plays, thereâ€™s an oracle for you. â€¢ Uncover over 170 modifying Blessings - Imbue your Oracle with unique passives yielding potent effects that changes up your fundamental tactics. Choose between Star Blessings, passive effects with lower power, or Black Hole Blessings, powerful passive effects with a drawback.

entry.title: Vostok â€” Story Maker
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$3.99 â†’ Free [Free ~ $3.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šFree

Application Description

Welcome to Vostok â€“ your ultimate companion for crafting captivating stories and stunning collages, designed to elevate your social media presence! With Vostok, transforming your ideas into professional-grade posts and stories is now a breeze. Whether you're a blogger, photographer, or simply love sharing your life's moments on social media, Vostok provides all the tools you need to create content that will make an impact. Our sleek and user-friendly app seamlessly combines your passion for photography and storytelling, offering a dynamic platform to showcase your awe-inspiring moments. Embracing a minimalist style, Vostok becomes your canvas for unlimited creativity. A vast collection of templates, stickers, and effects empowers you to design unique stories that reflect your individuality. But Vostok goes beyond creative freedom; it's all about simplicity. Our intuitive interface makes editing and sharing your content effortless, freeing up more time for you to focus on crafting compelling narratives that your followers will adore. No more waiting! Embark on your Vostok journey today and craft captivating posts and stories that leave a lasting impression! Here's a glimpse of some of our features: Â· 200+ design templates for social media Â· Exclusive fonts with Cyrillic support Â· 450+ unique stickers Â· Atmospheric dust and grain effects for photos Â· Variety of backgrounds: paper textures, marble, gradients, colors Â· Ad-free with no subscription requirements Â· Dark mode compatibility Recognized as one of the Best Apps of 2019 by Apple. With over 200+ templates, Vostok is your go-to toolkit for creating standout social media content. We eagerly look forward to your ideas and feedback. Connect with us at hello@vostokapp.ru or drop us a direct message on Instagram at @vostokapp.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Auto Redial App
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$2.99 â†’ $2.49 [$0.99 ~ $2.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$2.49

Application Description

With this application, you can make automatic calls to the numbers you want efficiently and in a personalized way. You can define the number of repetitions, the interval between calls, add an extension, activate vibration before dialing, and even schedule your calls using a built-in calendar. Auto Redial App also offers a simple and intuitive interface, detailed call history, and multiple customization options to fit your needs. This application is ideal for anyone who needs to make repetitive calls automatically â€” such as an appointment call, a busy call retry, or contacting services where the line is busy. Main Features: - Automatically redial busy or unanswered calls. - Set number of retries and time intervals. - Schedule calls in advance via calendar. - Add extensions automatically after dialing. - Enable vibration before each redial. - Call history and retry stats. Perfect for: - Booking appointments (doctors, embassies, etc.) - Customer service or tech support - Calling public offices - Freelancers and business owners following up clients Whether youâ€™re calling to book a doctorâ€™s appointment, reach customer service, or just trying to connect when the line is busy, this app saves time and frustration.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Hear My Baby Heartbeat Monitor
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$7.99 â†’ $5.99 [$5.99 ~ $7.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$5.99

Application Description

Pregnant? This is for YOU! Hear My Baby is the leading app allowing you to use just your iPhone microphone to record and share your babyâ€™s heart sounds. It is the best-in-class, has 5000 5* ratings, is super simple and safe to use. Amazing with Apple Airpods and Bluetooth Headphones. Great support! "It took some time and patience... thank you for creating this cheap, awesome technology to use at home." - Niki "I was skeptical at first. Great app! Worth it." - Legretta Hear My Baby Heartbeat is Category #1 in the USA and 102 other countries since 2018 with over 500,000 downloads and multi-millions of recordings. Here's why: Developed by parents like you (with expertise in sound engineering and app development) who wanted a trustworthy, safe and easy-to-use way to record our baby's fetal sounds (kicks, heart beat etc.) - and keep a record of a quality that we hadn't been able to find before in other apps. With over 500,000 downloads it has been extensively tested on expectant mothers. **** But honestly, does it actually work?? **** Yes. We've sound-engineered Hear My Baby to isolate the baby's heart beat, heart sound (kicks, heartbeat and more) and using an advanced algorithm, amplify them making them easier to detect and hear. NOTE: It takes time, technique and patience and depends on the position and number of weeks of your baby so you'll need to stick with it. When you do, our results are excellent. Only try from 16 weeks best results around 27 weeks. We want you to be happy with Hear My Baby heartbeat and getting results can sometimes be difficult. If you are struggling (can't find your own heartbeat etc.) DO contact us via support. We constantly improve our tutorial to handhold you through use. GIFT THIS APP: Click the â€œBuy Appâ€ arrow on the iTunesÂ® App Store FAQs **** No Accessories Required **** We use the internal microphone from your phone to attempt to listen and record your baby heart sounds. We recommend Bluetooth Headphones for best results. **** How It Works **** 1. Hear My Baby, has been precisely engineered to listen to abdominal sounds, then record and amplify them. Listen to your own heartbeat first to confirm the app is set up correctly. 2. It works best when baby is head down and their back is facing forwards. 3. Remove the case, be in a very quiet room and focus on your lower abdomen. 4. Our simple recording management helps you to keep a record of their special beat 5. Take a selfie if you wish and share 6. We'll walk you through exactly how to get the best baby heartbeat results **** Easy Share Feature **** Sharing is awesome you can opt to share via Facebook, Whats App, Instagram or email. **** We Care About Your Privacy **** We take your privacy and special moment seriously. You decide who sees or hears it and can delete it at any time. **** Before you start... **** You DO need to carefully follow the instructions for Hear My Baby to work. A quiet room is critical for results as the mic is super sensitive. Hear My Baby doesn't fake the baby heartbeat or other fetal sounds :) Please Note: results are normally superb, however the recording may not work if your placenta is at the front of the tummy or the baby is in the wrong position. **** Supported Phones **** All iPhones. We don't support iPad. **** Worried about safety? We are too! *** HMB is safe but to be extra sure DO switch your iPhone to airplane mode. This is a precaution and automatically stops all cellular transmissions. **** Is it a substitute for medical devices/support? **** No - Hear My Baby Heartbeat monitor is not a substitute for medical support - if you don't get a result it doesn't mean anything is wrong :)- Consult your doctor for any advice. We are NOT approved by the FDA or any medical authority. This is not a medical device and is not a medical baby heartbeat monitor or baby doppler. Please do check our T&Cs before downloading. For results examples: www.facebook.com/hearmybaby www.instagram.com/hearmybabyapp

Application Screenshot

entry.title: RadarScope
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Pro Tier 2ï¼š$99.99 â†’ $14.99 [$14.99 ~ $99.99]

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$9.99

In-App Purchases

  • Pro Tier 2ï¼š$14.99
  • Pro Tier 1ï¼š$9.99
  • RadarScope Pro Subscriptionï¼š$9.99

Application Description

RadarScope is an AMS-award-winning weather visualization tool that empowers meteorologists, public safety officials, storm spotters, and weather enthusiasts to view a full suite of single-site radar data and related severe weather products. Your initial purchase provides professional radar visualization in a fully native app, free from distracting and invasive practices, with optional subscription packages to add even more capabilities. Whether youâ€™re scanning for a mesocycloneâ€™s tell-tale hook echo, pinpointing the landfall of a hurricaneâ€™s eye wall, or identifying velocity couplet, hail spike, or debris ball signatures, RadarScope displays native radar data in its original radial format. You see what the radar sees almost as soon as the radar sees it, with automatic updates every two to ten minutes depending on the radarâ€™s scanning strategy. Your initial app purchase includes the following: â€¢ Full suite of single-site radar products for the US, Canada, Guam, Denmark, Finland, and Germany â€¢ 6-frame radar loops â€¢ Two built-in providers for radar data â€¢ Tornado, thunderstorm, flash flood, special marine, snow squall, and extreme wind warnings in the US â€¢ Selected severe weather warnings in Canada and Australia â€¢ NWS-generated storm tracks with hail, TVS, and mesocyclone attributes â€¢ Inspector and distance tools â€¢ Color palette options for radar data â€¢ AllisonHouse data plan integration â€¢ Spotter Network integration for storm and location reporting â€¢ mPING integration for submitting weather reports to NSSL â€¢ Bundled maps with political boundaries, water bodies, and major highways, optimized for low-bandwidth use â€¢ Support for widgets and complications â€¢ Universal app for Apple platforms, including Apple Watch and Apple TV â€¢ Family Sharing support RadarScope Pro Tier One is an optional annual subscription that adds more features for tracking severe weather: â€¢ 30-frame radar loops â€¢ Cloud-to-ground lightning strikes â€¢ Severe weather watches in the US and Canada â€¢ Special weather statements in the US and Canada â€¢ Mesoscale convective and precipitation discussions â€¢ SPC convective, tornado, hail, wind, and fire outlooks â€¢ WPC excessive rainfall outlooks in the US â€¢ Local storm reports in the US â€¢ Custom color palette support â€¢ Multi-pane display (2 on phones; 4 on larger devices) â€¢ Family Sharing support RadarScope Pro Tier Two is an optional annual or monthly subscription that transforms RadarScope into a more complete visualization tool for a larger suite of weather products, including: â€¢ Everything in Pro Tier One â€¢ 50-frame radar loops â€¢ A third provider for US radar data â€¢ NEXRAD Level II radar data for the US with a 30-year historical archive â€¢ Historical NEXRAD Level III, super-res, and non-US radar data with a 30-day archive â€¢ Historical NWS bulletins with a 19-year archive â€¢ GOES East and GOES West satellite products â€¢ NSSLâ€™s Multi-Radar Multi-Sensor (MRMS) products â€¢ NCEPâ€™s Real-Time Mesoscale Assimilation (RTMA) products â€¢ Surface observations â€¢ Atmospheric soundings in the US â€¢ Hail size, hail probability, and azimuthal shear contours with a 30-day archive â€¢ More detailed transportation and satellite imagery maps â€¢ Custom color palette support for GOES, MRMS, and RTMA â€¢ Server-sent events for radar and warning updates â€¢ Cross-platform subscription sharing on up to 5 devices â€¢ Family sharing support If you choose to buy a RadarScope Pro subscription, it will be charged to your App Store account. The subscription will be auto-renewed within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period at the same price you originally paid. Subscriptions may be managed and auto-renewal disabled via your App Store account settings after the purchase. Once purchased, the subscription cannot be canceled during the active subscription period. DTN is committed to safeguarding your privacy online. Our privacy policy is available for review at https://www.dtn.com/privacy-policy/ Please visit our web site for more information.

Application Description

Speech to text : Voice to text is the powerful, real-time dictation solution. Based on the latest artificial intelligence and using a powerful speech recognition engine, This Dictation app accurately transcribes your speech to text in real time. The clean elegant design, along with the non-stop voice recognition and other features means you can relax and focus on your thoughts and content. Using our app , your words will be magically transcribed into text without your ever needing to touch a keyboard. Now you can use the power of your voice to create your words! Easily share your text and files later! (Works with Evernote, Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive, Facebook, Twitter, Snapchat, WhatsApp and other iOS supported sharing apps.) Whether youâ€™re a professional writer, doctor, lawyer, disabled or somehow prevented from traditional typing, Speech to text : Voice to text app will swiftly solve your transcription problems and help you achieve your writing goals today! This fantastic speech-to-text app will allow you to do more with your iPhone/ iPad : ãƒ»Longer Record time: -DICTATE CONTINUOUSLY up-to 1 HOUR. ãƒ»Unlimited save & edits ãƒ»Transcribed text can be edited directly. ãƒ»Ideal for both individual and group transcription ãƒ»Background support for voice recognition. ãƒ»On-device Speech Recognition. â€¢ Voice recognition support for 59 languages and accents. â€¢ Share your text on social networks. â€¢ Copy your text to other apps. â€¢ Send your text as an email or text message. â€¢ Create PDF instantly with single click. â€¢ Convert text your notes, reports, letters into PDF instantly â€¢ Text Analysis using AI. â–º Currently Supported Speech Recognition Languages: Arabic, Cantonese, Catalan, Chinese, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Malay, Norwegian, BokmÃ¥l, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Shanghainese, Slovak, Spanish, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese. Technology: New iOS 14 Speech framework having state of the art accuracy, Faster ,Automatically adapts to the user Super easy: Simply click the microphone and start dictating. No need to login or register You can add new paragraphs, punctuation marks, smileys and other special characters using simple voice commands. Who Should Use Speech to Text : Voice to Text ? 1. Reporters: Interviews, conversations and more are easily recorded and transcribed, preserving the original audio. 2. Writers: Novelists, Authors, can all write in their true voice, capturing their moments of inspiration anytime, anywhere. 3. Professionals: Doctors, lawyers, managers, etc. Easily transcribe your daily tasks, notes, conference calls, letters and more! Your voice makes it happen! 4. Elderly or Disabled: Eliminates slow typing, commonly misspelled words or embarrassing composition mistakes. This app makes it convenient and easy to send and share your words with those you love. 5. Language Students: Text analysis using AI , Easily learn and master new words and languages by practicing dictation with speech to text app ! SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS We offer three auto-renewing subscription options: $1.99 / month $9.49 / 6 months - Save 20% $14.49 / 1 year - Save 40% The price corresponds to the same price segment , which are set in the â€œApple App Store Matrixâ€ for other currencies You can cancel a subscription anytime by turning off auto renewal though your iTunes account settings.This must be done 24 hours before the end of subscription period to avoid being charged. The cancellation will take effect the day after the last day of the current subscription. Terms of Service : https://voiceovermaker.com/termsofuse Privacy Policy: https://voiceovermaker.com/privacypolicy Support: Please email for any suggestions/feedback voiceovermakerz@gmail.com
